replies.author: 阔乐
replies.txt_content:
THIS FOLDER NEEDS TO BE DIRECTLY UNDER THE "datapacks" FOLDER OF YOUR WORLD, IF IT IS NESTED WITHIN ANOTHER FOLDER IT WON'T WORK

To change the timer edit the file:
/data/rng_item/functions/main.mcfunction

To change which slots to randomize edit the file:
/data/rng_item/functions/randomize.mcfunction

To change randomization tables edit the JSON files in:
/data/rng_item/loot_tables/



翻译一下.....

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
阔乐 发表于 2020-6-3 11:28
THIS FOLDER NEEDS TO BE DIRECTLY UNDER THE "datapacks" FOLDER OF YOUR WORLD, IF IT IS NESTED WITHIN  ...
这个是关于数据包的配置介绍
意思差不多就是这个文件夹要放在你的存档的datapacks文件夹里面

然后修改计时器在
/data/rng_item/functions/randomize.mcfunction

自定义随机的物品栏
/data/rng_item/functions/randomize.mcfunction

修改随机可能出的物品
/data/rng_item/loot_tables/

你可以另外找一个倒计时三分钟的计时器
